programs.title: Foundations Clinic
programs.description: Build your tennis fundamentals with our beginner-friendly clinic. Learn proper grip, stance, and basic strokes.

programs.title: Stroke Development
programs.description: Refine your technique and develop consistency. Focus on groundstrokes, volleys, and movement.

programs.title: Competitive Drills
programs.description: Match-play intensity training for experienced players. Point construction, tactics, and pressure situations.

programs.title: Private Lesson
programs.description: One-on-one instruction tailored to your specific goals. Video analysis and personalized feedback included.

programs.title: Beginner 4-Week Course
programs.description: Complete introduction to tennis for adults. Learn fundamentals in a supportive, fun environment.
